14.content:
So me and Jupiter have become friends since the last time we met. (http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite... (WIP)) And still friends now. One day Jupiter asked me to visit her at park, so I did what I say, I'm not sure what she wants, but I have to do it. Its night and I saw Sailor Jupiter waiting for me.

Me: Okay Jupiter, I'm here. What is it?

Jupiter: I just wanted to show you something...

But Jupiter knocked me out with Chloroform which went through my nose and make me blacked out.

I woke up and looked around, I have been tied up to a chair in a room and then Jupiter appears and walks right to me

Me: Jupiter, what were you thinking?

Jupiter: Don't worry James; I want to show you something without anyone knowing.

Then Jupiter reach something out and show to me, it was a pendant and she start swinging it

Jupiter: Just watch the pendant, James. Watch it move left and right... left and right...

I can only do nothing but watch the pendant swinging, as I do, I feel very sleepy that I can't keep me eyes open. A few minutes later and I feel asleep and under Jupiter's Control, after that, Jupiter untie the ropes

Jupiter: Wake up, James.

I woke up, still under Jupiter's control.

Jupiter: Stand up, James

I stand up, following Jupiter's command, then walk to me

Jupiter: Now James... I want you to...

15332.content: What if James and Sailor Jupiter get mind controlled by an evil version of Sailor Mercury?
15332.title: Evil Sailor Mercury controls James and Jupiter

choices: Mercury has some embarrassing mind control games for me and Jupiter
Mercury's twisted, and decides on doing something else to us
153321.content:
"Wake up!" someone says to me, and I do. I snap awake. That's strange. I've never regained consciousness in that way before, like someone throwing a switch.

"I knew you'd turn evil one day, Sailor Mercury!" someone says. It's Sailor Jupiter. We're both stuck to a hovering metal column, the floor several inches below us. Gravity manipulation. We're in a lab. There are all sorts of things I don't recognize, but the overall layout suggests "Evil Research." It would look pretty cool if I could work out why I was here.

"No you didn't!" Mercury tells Jupiter. She sounds pouty when she says it, which isn't like the Mercury I know. This one wears her hair longer, and her suit's a darker blue, almost purple. "I'm the last person you ever expected to turn evil! Though I'm not the same person you know, and I'm not really evil. I'm just trying out a few things."

"Like evil," says Jupiter. I look over at her. Sailor Jupiter's mad, not confused. Maybe she stayed awake the whole time. What was the last thing I remember? I can't. I woke up this morning. Then I woke up again, here. The rest is a blank.

"More like mischief," says Mercury, thinking Jupiter's quip over. "If I was evil, you would have been in for a much ruder awakening. Which can still be arranged."

"Why exactly are we here, Mischievous Alternate Sailor Mercury?" I ask her. She smiles sweetly. She doesn't look very evil, but I'll wait and see.

"I have a series of trials to run both of you through," Mercury says. "Innocuous. A little demented. I think you'll both like it."

"You must have gotten over on us with mind control," I say.

"Just on you, James," says Mercury. "I used knockout gas on Jupiter."

"That's low!" I say, which is only telling the truth.

"Yeah?" says Mercury. "You won't believe what's next!"

Sailor Mercury sneers, and I feel uneasy.
153321.title: James and Jupiter meet a naughty Mercury

After a while, I saw a room with a door open, "What a weird room, I wonder who works here" I asked myself. Then...
1533221.title: My day is not so great

15332211.content:
'WHAM!!!', I got hit and then fade out. After a while, I woke up and look around and then look down, I have been tied up and then I look up and see a shadow, I don't know who it is, but she is specking to me, "Well, well, well, who do we got here?" said a voice. I didn't gave the answer back. "Don't want to answer? Then I will let you" said the same voice and then two hands appear behind me and some sort of helmet went to my face and then a low voice appear, "Your eyes are getting restless, you can't control yourself". "My eyes are getting restless, I can't control myself" I said. "You must obey what your misstress say" said a low voice. "I must obey what my Misstress say" I said.

Meanwhile, Sailor Venus is waiting for me to come back and she is worried. "What is taking James so long?" said Sailor Venus, "I must check what he is doing in here". So Sailor Venus went into the house and look around for me and then she found me. "James! Your okay!" said Sailor Venus and then she notice that something is wrong with me, "Um...James are you okay?". "I must obey what my Misstress say" I said. "Your Misstress? James! Wake up!" said Sailor Venus. "Only my Misstress will let me do what she say" I said. "I must get out of here" said Sailor Venus and then she run right to the door, but it is locked. "Why isn't this door open?" said Sailor Venus. "Because my misstress locked this door to make people her slave and you will be the next one" I said and I'm behind Sailor Venus. "James. Who is your Misstress?" said Sailor Venus. "It's one of your friends, Sailor Venus" I said and Sailor Mars appears, It dosen't look like the Mars I know. (Look at this picture and you know what I mean: http://davisjes.deviantart.com/art/Dark-...). Sailor Venus is shocked that Sailor Mars is the one who mind controled me. "Sailor Mars? Why did you mind control James?" said Sailor Venus. "Well, Sailor Venus, I'm not really Sailor Mars and the reason I mind control James is because I need someone to take out the Sailor Scouts and Sailor Venus, you will be the next one" said the evil Sailor Mars, "James, grab Sailor Venus before she escape". "Yes my misstress" I said.

Just before I grab Sailor Venus, she move to her left and plan to attack me, but I grab her arm and then grab her neck and lift her up. "James, please wake up! This isn't you" said Sailor Venus. "It's no use Sailor Venus, you can't ask him what to do" said Evil Mars. I squeeze my hand and Sailor Venus fade out.

Sailor Venus woke up and look around and see me still under mind control, I walk right to her and say "Well Sailor Venus how does it feel like been tied up". "James, Please wake up, please. You must trust me. Sailor Mars has become evil after she been kidnapped, but you must find a way to break out" said Sailor Venus. "Sorry Sailor Venus, my misstress want's me to do something and I can't take lies" I said and I tied Sailor Venus mouth shut and then mind control her, "Just relax Sailor Venus, give your mind to our misstress and we will do what our misstress say". Sailor Venus and just can't break out and went to a deep sleep while I untied Sailor Venus mouth and then Evil Mars appears. "Wake up Sailor Venus" said Evil Mars and Sailor Venus woke up, "James, will you untie Sailor Venus". "Yes Misstress" I said and untie Sailor Venus. "Stand up Sailor Venus" said Evil Mars and Sailor Venus stand up, "Now you two must be dress and be ready until the four remaning Sailor Scouts come" and Evil Mars come back with two Dark clothes for me (http://sonicpal.deviantart.com/gallery/#...) & Sailor Venus (http://davisjes.deviantart.com/art/Dark-...) and then place me and Sailor Venus a few cm from the front door until the four remaining Sailor Scouts appears. After that...

153322112.content:
As Sailor Venus and I wait by the front door of the weird house for the rest of the Scouts to show up, someone kicks it in.

"Venus, James, catch her!" Evil Mars shouts from behind us, having seen it's Sailor Jupiter.

What I see is the front door clipping Sailor Venus on one shoulder and nearly spinning her out of her pumps. As I'm helplessly compelled to try grabbing Jupiter, a rope of dark flame from Evil Mars parts my hair from behind on its way out the front door, to be answered by a burst of lightning from the porch. I barely manage to dodge the arc. My hair's smoldering a little.

"Jupiter, be careful!" Sailor Mercury calls from outside the door. I run out, following my last orders to catch Jupiter, just as Mercury fills the entire house with fog.

"Get off of me, James!" Jupiter yells as I grapple with her.

"I must catch you, Sailor Jupiter, as my mistress commands," I tell Jupiter. We go down in a heap, wrestling for dominance. I feel Mercury grabbing me from behind and telling me to snap out of it, and I inform her that it's not that easy to break Evil Mars' hold on me.

I'm sandwiched between Mercury and Jupiter, and the three of us wind up tussling until we're back inside the foggy parlor of the decrepit old house. Venus has recovered and pulls Mercury off of me to help in single-mindedly restraining Jupiter.

"What's going on out there?" Evil Mars yells, lost in the fog. A few more spirals of black flame lance through the room, but she can't see what she's aiming at. She stumbles over something and curses.

There's a sound of breaking glass from somewhere near the back door, and Sailor Moon starts shouting about righting wrongs and all of that. Pretty soon, her tiara starts winging around inside of the house, ricocheting here and there indiscriminately.

"Sailor Moon!" Mercury shouts, standing up just in time to send Moon's tiara caroming off her head. Oopsie! Mercury collapses on top of me and Venus, knocked out, which is that much more weight on top of poor Jupiter.

"OOF!" Jupiter wheezes, dogpiled. That takes most of the fight out of her. She's mad, but winded.

"James, Venus!" Evil Mars says. "I command you to... OWW!" Another partial score for Moon's tiara. "OWW!" isn't a command Venus and I can do much with.

"Nyah nyah!" Moon calls. She's close, but still obscured by fog. Sailor Moon then cries out when a blast of Evil Mars' black flame licks too close to her. Meanwhile, Moon's tiara is still recoiling around the room.

Venus and I get Jupiter's arms pinioned behind her back and hold her, since our last complete command from Evil Mars was to "Catch her." She's caught.

"I command that..." Evil Mars tries to say quickly, only to get dinked by Moon's tiara again. "DAMN IT!"

Damn what, exactly? Venus and I again ignore the interrupted command.

"Ha HA!" says Moon, still hidden somewhere in the fog with Evil Mars. "That will teach you to... OOF!"

It sounds like Evil Mars just punched Sailor Moon in the stomach, but I can't see a thing.

"I've had about enough of this nonsense!" yells Evil Mars, pushed to her limit.
153322112.title: 3 Scouts vs. Evil Mars, James and Venus

15332221.content:
Me and Sailor Mercury are waiting for Sailor Moon to return, but after a while Sailor Moon hasen't return.

"Do you think that Sailor Moon haven't notice that we are waiting for her?" I said

"Yeah" I said

So me and Mercury went in the house and look around.

After a while of looking for Sailor Moon, I feel something is tounching me.

"Hey, Mercury? Do you think that someone is touching me?" I said "Gah!?"

"I'm not sure, James" said Mercury, then she turn around and then I dissappear, "James? Hey James, where are you?"

I woke up and look around and saw Sailor Moon, but her clothes are dark (Pic: http://davisjes.deviantart.com/art/Dark-...)

"Sailor Moon, where were you?" I said

"I was waiting for you and Mercury, James" said the Dark Sailor Moon, "I was thinking of making you and your friend my slave"

"Just, get me out! Enough with you jokes?" I said

"It's not a joke, James" said the Dark Sailor Moon, "Now have a look at this watch, see it move left and right, your mind is getting sleepy, then you will be under my power"

"Yes...Misstress...I am under your power" I said, under mind control

Back with Sailor Mercury

"Why would James went without me?" said Sailor Mercury

Then I appear

"James! I never though I would never see you again" said Sailor Mercury

"It's okay...Mercury" I said

"Are you okay, James?" said Sailor Mercury

What Happends next

This is getting weird" I said and climb the nearest tree I can see and wait.

Minutes Later

Sailor Mercury went to the forest, looking for me, then she went to the tree I was on, "trying to look for me?" I called. "James? Is that you?" called Sailor Mercury. Then I swing off the tree to the branch and Sailor Mercury said "James, it is you. Did you found anything in the forest?". "Yes. You!" I said. "What? Me? James, what's the problem with you?" said Sailor Mercury. Then I swing down and wrap Sailor Mercury up and said "Well, well, well Sailor Mercury, you didn't think that I was a Naga". "James, please stop this, this is not you" said Sailor Mercury, "Sorry, Sailor Mercury, but I must make you my slave" I asked while I mind control Sailor Mercury. After that, I asked "Well Sailor Mercury. How are you feeling?" I said, "Very great, Master" said Sailor Mercury, under my control, "You need some sleep" I said then I grab her and climb to the tree.

The next day

1533322222211.content:
I was just relaxing on the grass with my eyes closed until someone call out, "Hey, James. Are you awake?". "Yeah I'm awake. Oh, hey Sailor Moon. What do you want?" I said. "It's my friends they become evil, I ran away from them and they kidnapped my sister" said Sailor Moon. "Why is that?" I said. "Because they will come for either you or me and I need you to help me" said Sailor Moon. "Okay, I'll help you, because we are friends" I said. "Thanks, James. You are the best" said Sailor Moon.

Sailor Moon show me the place where her friends become evil. "So is this the place?" I said. "Well, yeah" said Sailor Moon and then we went in and look around for Sailor Moon's sister. I took a wrong turn and hit something or someone. "OW!" I yell. "Are you okay, James?" said Sailor Moon. "Yeah" I said, "I don't think someone heard us". But what I thought was wrong, two hodded figures appear. "I see two are here" said one. "Where's my sister?" said Sailor Moon. "You need to take us out if you want to know where your sister is" said another one and me and Sailor Moon are in battle mode.

After the battle, the two hodded figures are on tthe ground and puff out. "I never notice how strong you are getting, Sailor Moon" I said. "With a lot of work, I'll take someone out" said Sailor Moon, "Now tell me, where did you put me sister?". "She is in the third room on the left" said one of the hooded figures. "Thanks" I said and me & Sailor Moon looked for the third door which is on the left side. "Hey, Sailor Moon. I found your sister" I yelled to Sailor Moon. "Big Sister!" said Chibi Sailor Moon. "Little Sister! Your Okay!" said Sailor Moon. "Let's go, girls" I said.

When me & Sailor Moon are almost to the exit, the same two hodded figures appear. "Got out of the way" I said. "I don't think so" said one. Without me and Sailor Moon knowing, Chibi Sailor Moon place something on my back and then put a thumb up on one of the hooded figures. "Do you think that you have a chance to takes out again?" said one of the hooded figures. "I bet I would" I said. "Well try to take this out" said the same hooded figure and then I feel dizzy. "James! Are you okay?" said Sailor Moon. "I don't know" I said and move backward and then two hands appear. "Hey! Let go!" I yelled and then another hooded figure appears and holds a bottle and towel, the hooded figure pour the bottle to the towel and put it on my nose and mouth, I try to struggle but I feel dizzy and fade out and the hands and the hooded figure disappear. "James!" yelled Sailor Moon, "What did you do to him?". The hodded figures open there hoodies and it was...

15511.content:
I was relaxing at the park, thinking about the big day I had and then a storm appears. "That's odd, there nothing on the news about a storm appearing here" I said and then something or someone appears, it was Sailor Moon! "About time you got here" I said. "Sorry about that. I was busy" said Sailor Moon and then a thunderstorm, which is not white, but black, has appear and shock Sailor Moon.

After the storm have been finished, I ran to Sailor Moon and check if she is okay, but her hand grabbed me neck and start to choke. "Sailor Moon! What are you doing?" I cried and then I blacked out. I woke up and look around, I notice that I have been tied up, but by who? Then Sailor Moon appears, but she dosen't look the same (Here's a picture: http://davisjes.deviantart.com/art/Dark-... ). "Sailor Moon, why did you choke me? I thought we are friends?" I said. "We are friend. But I need someone to keep me company. Ever since that thunderstorm hit me and I remember about when I was evil" said Dark Moon. I try to struggle out but no anvil. "James, look at my eyes. Your feeling sleepy" said Dark Moon and I'm feeling sleepy and I can't break free.

After a while. "So, James. How do you feel?" said Dark Moon. "I'm feeling better, Misstress" I said, under Dark Moon's power and then she untie me and say, "Now James, when your friends show, I want you to catch her". "Yes, Misstress. Do you want to mind control them" I said. "No, just make sure they don't escape" said Dark Moon and then...

155112111.content:
Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter walked in to find me and Sailor Moon, just until I walk in. "An enemy! You won't get away with me!" yelled Sailor Jupiter as she run and attacked me and then Sailor Mercury turn on the light and notice that Sailor Jupiter just attacked me. "Jupiter! You hit James!" said Sailor Mercury. "I'm sorry James! Are you...?" then Sailor Jupiter stop, because I was laughing. "You think you can attack your best friend?" I said, evily. "James, what's wrong with you?" said Sailor Mercury. "My misstress really want to see you two" I said. "Who is your misstress, James?" said Sailor Jupiter. "Why just follow me?" I said and then walk backwards into the shadows.

Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter walk to the shadows looking for where am I and then they heard me called out, "It's impossible to look for me". "Just tell us where you are, James" said Sailor Jupiter. "Why tell that to your friend" I said. "I can't find where you are" said Sailor Mercury. "Well I got two words for you" I said and then Sailor Mercury & Sailor Jupiter just got knocked out and then I walked out of the shadows, "Behind you!".

Just then Sailor Mercury woke up and look around, no sign of Sailor Jupiter, but only me. "James, where am I and also where did you put Sailor Jupiter? said Sailor Mercury and then I said, "I think you friend is hidden somewhere with my misstress and also your in..."

15512.content:
It started out, when I was waiting for Sailor Mercury to come out. "Sailor Mercury took a long time for her to come out. What's taking her so long?" I said and I have no choise but to find her. I search everywhere and still no sign for Sailor Mercury. "Maybe I should give up and go home" I said and I did, until something hit me from behind and I got blacked out.

"Ow...My head...Where am I?" I said and look around. "You are in my lab, James" said a voice. "Who are you and how do you know my name?" I called out. "Do you know who I am? I'm your friend, Sailor Mercury" said the same voice and it was Sailor Mercury, but she looks different (Pic: http://davisjes.deviantart.com/art/Dark-...). "Why didn't you come out?" I said. "Well...That's something you need to find out" said Dark Mercury, "Now let's see...Mind control, perfect!"

A second later, a TV appears from the celing and look right at me, the screen been turn on and within 14 seconds, I'm under Dark Mercury's control. The machine have been taken of from me and I can move again, but my eyes are different, instead of the current hazel, my eyes are dark blue. "Now your my slave, James" said Dark Mercury, "I got something for you. Can you come with me, to find the Sailor Scouts". "Yes, Misstress Mercury" I said. But before me and Dark Mercury find the Sailor Scouts...
15512.title: Meeting the Dark Mercury

155122.content:
"Hey, James! It's us, Sailor Jupiter and Sailor Venus!" Sailor Jupter called out, but no answer. "Maybe, James is not in here, how about we look around?" said Sailor Venus. "Good idea, Venus. Let's split up" said Sailor Jupiter, "You take the left and I take the right, we will meet back here, got it?". "Got it, Jupiter" said Sailor Venus and both Sailor Venus & Sailor Jupiter went to different directions. "Wow, James. You didn't tell me that you meet you friends here" said Dark Mercury. "I didn't meet me friends here, misstress. They just come here to find me" I said while I'm under Dark Mercury's control. "I'll go to find Jupiter, while you find Venus" said Dark Mercury. "Yes, Misstress" I said.

A while later, Sailor Jupiter is looking for me, still. "Hey, James! Can you hear me?" Sailor Jupiter called out again. "I don't think, James can hear you, Jupiter" said a voice. "Who are you?" Sailor Jupiter called out and Dark Mercury come out from the shadows and face Sailor Jupiter. "Mercury? What are you doing here and where's James?" said Sailor Jupiter. "Jupiter, Jupiter, Jupiter. Didn't you remember? James is with me, as my slave" said Dark Mercury. "What? Mercury, what are you saying?" said Sailor Jupiter.

Meanwhile with Sailor Venus. "James! It's me, Sailor Venus! Can you hear me?" said Sailor Venus. "Yes, Sailor Venus. I can hear you" said a voice. "James? Is that you?" said Sailor Venus and I come out of the shadows. "James! It is you. I must tell Jupiter that I found you" said Sailor Venus. "I don't think you should go, Venus" I said. "James, what are you talking about?" said Sailor Venus. "My misstress, is finding Jupiter and I think she did a very good job of finding her" I said. "James, wake up!" said Sailor Venus and Dark Mercury appears, "Mercury? What are you doing here and where's Jupiter?". "Nice for you to come, Venus, I knocked Jupiter out and take here somewhere. James, take Venus out before she escape." said Dark Mercury. "Yes, misstress" I said. Then...
155122.title: Sailor Jupiter and Sailor Venus appears

This is me (James) being mind control by a girl from the Sailor Moon Series

EDIT 1: I run out of ideas for the Next mind control stuff, if you fought with one, send me an email and I might put it in

No killing

Sex is okay

You can use 1st person or 2nd person POV

If you have a fan made Sailor Senshi, make sure you have the following:
Name of Sailor Senshi plus real name
What see looks like
Age
Powers
Friends with other Sailor Senshi's
How she became a Sailor Sensh

Have Fun!!! And Please put chapter in, I can't do them myself
